documentation.text:
@dev Read the beacon of the last block inserted.
 @return bytes to be signed by bridge nodes.

@notice Returns the lastest epoch reported to the block relay.
 @return the last epoch.

@notice Returns the latest hash reported to the block relay.
 @return the last block hash.

@dev Determines if the contract is upgradable.
 @return true if the contract is upgradable.

@dev Read the beacon of the last block inserted.
 @return bytes to be signed by bridge nodes.

@notice Returns the lastest epoch reported to the block relay.
 @return the last epoch.

@notice Returns the latest hash reported to the block relay.
 @return the last block hash.

@dev Determines if the contract is upgradable.
 @return true if the contract is upgradable.

getLastBeacon().details: Read the beacon of the last block inserted.

returns._0: bytes to be signed by bridge nodes.

isUpgradable(address).details: Determines if the contract is upgradable.

returns._0: true if the contract is upgradable.

postNewBlock(uint256,uint256,uint256,uin.details: Post new block into the block relay.

params._drMerkleRoot: Merkle root belonging to the data requests.
params._epoch: Witnet epoch to which the block belongs to.
params._tallyMerkleRoot: Merkle root belonging to the tallies.

readDrMerkleRoot(uint256).details: Retrieve the requests-only merkle root hash that was reported for a specific block header.

returns._0: Requests-only merkle root hash in the block header.

readTallyMerkleRoot(uint256).details: Retrieve the tallies-only merkle root hash that was reported for a specific block header.

params._blockHash: Hash of the block header. tallies-only merkle root hash in the block header.

verifyDrPoi(uint256[],uint256,uint256,ui.details: Verifies the validity of a PoI against the DR merkle root.

params._index: the index in the merkle tree of the element to verify.
params._poi: the proof of inclusion as [sibling1, sibling2,..].

returns._0: true or false depending the validity.

verifyTallyPoi(uint256[],uint256,uint256.details: Verifies the validity of a PoI against the tally merkle root.

params._index: the index in the merkle tree of the element to verify.
params._poi: the proof of inclusion as [sibling1, sibling2,..].

returns._0: true or false depending the validity.

getLastEpoch().notice: Returns the lastest epoch reported to the block relay.

getLastHash().notice: Returns the latest hash reported to the block relay.

userdoc.notice: Contract to store/read block headers from the Witnet network.
